name: Lucky Rabbit Reflex!
description: An otome dating simulation game, Lucky Rabbit Reflex! sees our seventeen-year old heroine beginning her first and final year at a new school. Will she find friendship - or even romance - amongst the motley crew at Northmain College?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 460 MB available space

reviews.review_text: I am going back and forth on this game. Honestly if it weren't for the art, it would be much easier to make up my mind. As it stands, I would give it 7/10, only because despite the art I genuinely enjoyed the game.  Pros: Lots of content would take a lot of time to play through and get all of the different endings. The main character is relatable, and all of the datable characters are likeable.  Story is fluffy and cute, believable well written dialogue for the most part. Buy all the clothes.  Make all the pancakes.   Cons: dat chin tho... Jokes aside, my biggest complaint with the game is the art. Although I will say after a few hours of playing my irritation with the art subsided to a degree, but thats not to say that it grew on me because even after a few hours of play I would find myself distracted by the seemingly disjointed chins of literally every single character in the game. If you don't think you can get past the art, don't bother with this game. Even the CG's are pretty wonky looking. Some might not like the stat raising aspect (though I personally don't mind it) The story lacks any real depth, (again, I didn't necessarily mind this myself. For what it is, I think this is just fine, though others might be disappointed with this.)

Love it ! Great example of a really good otome game. Shame that not all are like this. Very funny. FULL of Surprises. Great characters. Challenging but overall fun coming up with strategies.  Time flies with this one, my only regret is I didn't catch it on SALE !
